claim.claim-text: 1. A device for scent training an animal, the device comprising:a housing having a front panel, wherein the front panel defines at least two scent openings;at least one sensor for each of the at least two scent openings;at least one closeable target scent container configured to receiving a target scent substance;a coupling device for the at least one closeable target scent container;a reward device configured to provide a reward to the animal;a control device coupled to the sensors, wherein:each sensor is configured to monitor whether the animal puts its nose into a respective scent opening and, provided this is the case, sending a corresponding notification signal to the control device;the coupling device is configured to be in a closed state in which the at least one closable target scent container is closed and to be in at least one coupling state in which at least one predetermined target scent container is opened and is fluidically coupled to at least one predetermined scent opening of the at least two scent openings; andthe control device is configured to activate the coupling device and the reward device in dependence on the notification signal, according to a predetermined program, or a combination thereof.

2. The device according to claim 1, wherein:the coupling device is configured to operate in at least two coupling states; and is further configured to:select one of the coupling states;start a first time measurement at a predetermined first point in time and activate the coupling device such that the coupling device assumes a selected coupling state;stop the first time measurement and simultaneously start a second time measurement in response to receiving the notification signal from one of the sensors associated with the at least one coupled target scent container;stop the second time measurement in response to not receiving the notification signal from this sensor; andin response to a duration of the second time measurement exceeding a predetermined threshold value, activate the reward device at a predetermined second point in time after the second time measurement is stopped in such a manner that the reward device issues a predetermined reward.

3. The device according to claim 1 further comprising a signaling device configured to generate a signal for the animal, wherein the control device is coupled to the signaling device and the control device is configured to activate the signaling device in dependence on the notification signal, according to the program, or a combination thereof.

4. The device according to claim 1 further comprising at least one closure surface for the at least one closeable target scent container, wherein:the at least one closeable target scent container has a closable target scent opening surrounded by a sealing edge;the coupling device comprises a drive device for the at least one target scent container; andthe drive device is configured to:move the at least one closeable target scent container into a first position, wherein a respective sealing edge rests completely against the closure surface or against one of the closure surfaces in such a manner that the respective target scent opening is closed; andmove the at least one closeable target scent container into a second position, wherein the respective target scent opening and those scent openings associated with this target scent opening according to a selected coupling state at least partially overlap.

5. The device according to claim 1 further comprising at least one cover having a closure surface for the at least one closeable target scent container, wherein:the at least one closeable target scent container has a closable target scent opening enclosed by a sealing edge;the coupling device comprises a drive device for the at least one cover; andthe drive device is configured to:move the at least one cover into a first position, wherein the respective closure surface rests completely against at least one of a plurality of sealing edges in such a manner that the respective target scent opening is closed; andmove the at least one cover into a second position wherein the respective closure surface does not rest completely against any of the plurality of sealing edges.

6. The device according to claim 1 further comprising at least one closable decoy scent container for receiving a decoy scent substance, wherein the coupling device is provided for the at least one decoy scent container and at least one of the following:in the closed state, the at least one decoy scent container is closed;in the coupling state or in at least one of two coupling states, at least one predetermined decoy scent container is opened and fluidically coupled to at least one predetermined scent opening,in the coupling state or at least one of the coupling states, at least one predetermined decoy scent container is opened and fluidically coupled to at least one predetermined scent opening and the at least one closeable target scent container is closed; ora combination thereof.

7. The device according to claim 6 further comprising at least one closure surface for the at least one decoy scent container, wherein:the at least one decoy scent container has a closable decoy scent opening surrounded by a sealing edge;the coupling device comprises a drive device for the at least one decoy scent container; andthe drive device is configured to:move the at least one decoy scent container into a first position, wherein the respective sealing edge can rest completely against the closure surface or one of the closure surfaces in such a manner that the respective decoy scent opening is closed; andmove the at least one decoy scent container into a second position, wherein the respective decoy scent opening and those scent openings associated with this decoy scent opening according to a selected coupling state at least partially overlap.

8. The device according to claim 6 further comprising at least one cover having a closure surface for the at least one decoy scent container, wherein:the at least one decoy scent container has a closable decoy scent opening surrounded by a sealing edge;the coupling device comprises a drive device for the at least one cover; andthe drive device is configured to:move the at least one cover into a first position, wherein the respective closure surface rests completely against at least one of a plurality of sealing edges in such a manner that the respective decoy scent opening is closed; andmove the at least one cover into a second position, wherein the respective closure surface does not rest completely against any of the plurality of sealing edges.

9. The device according to claim 6 further comprising a temperature control device for at least one of the at least one closeable target scent container, the at least one decoy scent container, or a combination thereof, wherein:the control device is coupled to the temperature control device; andthe control device is configured to activate the temperature control device in dependence on the notification signals, according to the program, or a combination thereof.

10. The device according to claim 1 further comprising a data memory coupled to the control device; and wherein the data memory stores at least part of the program and/or at least part of the data utilized by the predetermined program, at least part of the data processed by the program, or a combination thereof.

11. The device according to claim 1 further comprising:a remote control device for the control device; anda communication device capable of establishing a wireless, wired connection, or a combination thereof between the control device and the remote control device.
12. A method of using of a device configured according to claim 1 for scent training an animal, wherein the animal at least one of a dog, a cat, a pig, a monkey, a giant hamster rat or a rat.

13. A method for scent training an animal using a device configured according to claim 1, wherein:in a step a, providing the housing having the front panel wherein the front panel defines the at least two scent openings; and providing the at least one closeable target scent container adapted to receive a target scent substance;in a step b, filling the target scent substance into the at least one target scent container;in a step c, creating the closed state, wherein the at least one target scent container is closed;in a step d after the step c, creating the coupling state, wherein the at least one predetermined target scent container is opened and fluidically coupled to at least one predetermined scent opening;in a step e after said step d, monitoring whether the animal puts its nose into a respective scent opening for the at least one coupled scent opening;generating, in response to the animal putting its nose into the respective scent opening, the corresponding notification signal; andin a step f after the step e, rewarding the animal in dependence on the notification signal.

14. The method according to claim 13, wherein:in the step d, selecting the coupling state from a plurality of predetermined coupling states; and starting, at a predetermined first point in time, a first time measurement and creating a selected coupling state;in the step e, stopping the first time measurement and starting simultaneously a second time measurement as soon as the notification signal is generated; and stopping the second time measurement as soon as this notification signal is no longer generated; andin the step f, when a duration of the second time measurement exceeds a predetermined threshold, rewarding the animal in a predetermined manner at a predetermined second point in time after the second time measurement is stopped.

15. The method according to claim 14, wherein in the step e, canceling the first time measurement as soon as a predetermined time period has elapsed without any of the notification signals having been generated.
16. The method according to claim 14, wherein one or more results of time measurements, a cancelation of the first time measurement, or a combination thereof is stored.

17. The method according to claim 13, wherein:in a step g after the step f, a jump is made to the step c or d;a number of executions of step g is predetermined, limited by a predetermined time period, or a combination thereof; andin the step g, the coupling state, at least one of the points in time are changed or a combination thereof.

18. The method according to claim 13, wherein:in the step a, at least one closable decoy scent container for receiving a decoy scent substance is provided;in step b, a decoy scent substance is filled into the at least one decoy scent container, whereinin the closed state, the at least one decoy scent container is closed;in the coupling state, at least one predetermined decoy scent; container is opened and fluidically coupled to at least one predetermined scent opening;in the coupling state, at least one predetermined decoy scent container is opened and fluidically coupled to at least one predetermined scent opening and the at least one closeable target scent container is closed;or a combination thereof.
19. The method according to claim 14, wherein prior to step d or prior to the predetermined first point in time, at least one of the scent containers is brought to a predetermined temperature.
20. The method according to claim 13, wherein in the step f after the step e, generating a predetermined signal for the animal.
